thread.title: Robert Morgenthau on the Armenian Genocide

author: wsjcom
title: Robert Morgenthau on the Armenian Genocide
text: As a grandson of survivors of the Armenian genocide, I agree with Robert M. Morgenthau’s assessment on the need to recognize this dark chapter in our world’s history (“Will Trump Tell the Truth About the Armenian Genocide?,” op-ed, Jan. 26). And while his argument that President Trump has a unique opportunity to undo what his predecessors failed to do, Armenian-Americans are not holding their breaths. Every election brings new campaign promises from candidates looking for money and votes while promising to recognize the Armenian genocide, but who then succumb to Turkish pressure. What politicians fail to understand is...
